snippet: Noreen Harrington’s tip in 2003 sparked a major investigation of mutual funds by the New York attorney general’s office.
abstract: Wall Street veteran Noreen Harrington, whose tip in 2003 sparked a major investigation of mutual funds by New York attorney general's office, testifies that she warned New York Mets owners about investing further with Bernard L Madoff.
lead_paragraph: Noreen Harrington’s tip in 2003 sparked a major investigation of mutual funds by the New York attorney general’s office.

headline.seo: Witness Against Mets’ Owners Impressed Authorities With Her Credibility
headline.main: Previous Success for Witness in Mets Case
headline.print_headline: Previous Success for Witness in Mets Case
